moves.2... c5: Pe5 is undefended.  White often comes back with c3 instead.
moves.4. f4 d6 5. Nxc6 Qd7: I think taking the knight would be better.
moves.6. Na5 b6 7. Nc4 Ba6 8. e5 dxe5 9. fxe5: Taking it with the knight instead gives white the a6 bishop, potentially.
moves.9... O-O-O 10. Nd6+: NxPb6 looks better.  Bishop and pawn for the knight.
moves.13... Bxe2 14. Qe1 Nf6: Excellent.  The rook is now protected.
moves.15... Bxf1 16. Qxf1 Qd4+ 17. Qf2: Better to move the king.  Re1# ends the game.
moves.17... Ng4 18. c3: Re1# is the way to go.
